questions.question: Why is having 'a shared vision' important?

choices.answer: Everyone in the company knows what they are working towards.
Everyone is united through a common goal.
Everyone is able to chart the companies success.
Every one of these answers is right!

the effort made by someone to achieve something new.

copying someone else's idea.

takes risks by developing new products
listens to what customers want
